intro: Epilobium delicatum, commonly known as the slender willow herb, is a flowering plant belonging to the Onagraceae family. It is characterized by its slender, herbaceous stems and opposite leaves that are often hairy. The plant produces small, showy flowers with five petals, typically in shades of pink or white. It is native to temperate regions of the Northern Hemisphere and thrives in moist, well-drained soils. Epilobium delicatum is often found in wet meadows, stream banks, and woodland edges.
